text: The Wales Office (WO) ensures the smooth working of the devolution settlement in Wales, representing the UK government in Wales. The WO represents Welsh interests in Westminster. ==Ministers== Minister Portfolio Secretary of State for Wales Overall responsibility for the strategic direction of the Wales Office Minister for Welsh Stakeholders *Ensures that the interests of Wales are recognised *Regional development *Welfare, benefits and pensions *Health *Education and skills *Transport *Law and order Category:Politics of Wales Category:Government agencies of the United Kingdom Category:Organisations based in London Category:1999 establishments in the United Kingdom
title: Wales Office
